overview: Sattava Edusys is an education services company. My Talent™ is the Most Comprehensive Online Career Assessment, Career Guidance, Career Counselor and Career Test for students above the age of 14yrs. My Talent™ is the Most Comprehensive Career Assessment and Advisory Program for students above the age of 14yrs. It has been designed by accomplished experts (Ph.D.’s in Applied Psychology, Human Resource and Behavioral Sciences and IIM Alumni), who have counseled over 26000 students and have over 80,000 man-hours of enriching experience. Visit www.mytalent.co.in for more details.
